
***

#### 1. Upload list of study animals

To customize the list of animals, you need to create a ".json" file named **"animals.json"**, which includes the list of the study animals. Upload the necessary ".csv" file using the panel on the left to generate **"animals.json"**.

Below is an example of what this ".csv" file can look like:

***

This file can include as many variables about group composition as you want, for example the sex and age. The following columns  are *required* and the labels *must* be typed as in the quotes:

* <font face="Courier New">"ID"</font> | to specify the identity of the individuals.  
* <font face="Courier New">"GR"</font> | to specify the group, if multiple social units are being studied.

***

#### 2. Add animals.json file to iPad

* Once this ".csv" file has been uploaded in the left panel, the **"animals.json"** file will be generated. Click on "Download animals.json" to save the file and upload it to the iPad following <a id="link_to_welcome2" href="#" class="action-button">these instructions</a>.
  
***
Note that you can edit layout_info.json manually using any basic text editor or online using [jsoneditoronline.org](http://www.jsoneditoronline.org).

***
